discharge_note:
Discharge Summary for Darth Vader

Dear Pet Parent,

We are happy to inform you that Darth Vader is doing much better since his repeat consultation on 2025-02-21. His cough has stopped, he has started running and playing, and he is eating his food without any issues. Overall, he seems to be better and more lively.

During the consultation, we performed a repeat examination to monitor his progress.

We recommend that you continue to monitor Darth Vader's symptoms and behavior at home. If you notice any changes or if his condition worsens, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for entrusting us with the care of Darth Vader. We wish him continued health and happiness.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
Veterinary Assistant
